item.title: Travel Smarter: The Backpack That Doubles as a Mobile Office
item.description:
Travel Smarter: The Backpack That Doubles as a Mobile Office

Our pals at This is Ground recently launched a "smart" backpack that will make you feel like the coolest, most in-the-know traveler out there. Crossing town (or the globe) with a laptop, iPad, headphones, and WiFi port can weigh you down - but it's a reality for many, especially those who work from the road.

item.title: Precious cargo: the Container Artist Residency program sets sail.
item.description:
Precious cargo: the Container Artist Residency program sets sail.

Aboard commercial cargo ships is where the Container Artist Residency 01 program is finding its abode. Completely isolated from the rest of the world, the Residency allows its artists to work in a remote space with no tangible lines of communication to the outside world.

item.title: City Guide Spotlight: New York City
item.description:
City Guide Spotlight: New York City

A few days ahead of NYC's hectic and inspiring Armory Week, Scope and Pulse Art Fairs, we embarked upon an overhaul of our NYC City Guide. While there were some stalwarts that needed to be added, New York City's ever-evolving nature means plenty of brand new spots made the list.

item.title: Finlandia Caviar Shop and Restaurant, Helsinki, Finland
item.description:
Finlandia Caviar Shop and Restaurant, Helsinki, Finland

In designing a space that would be devoted primarily to the consumption of caviar, Helsinki-based designer Joanna Laajisto was careful to avoid clichés of outré parties, fur coats and blinding bling.

item.title: Inside the Stunning Mansion in Ex Machina
item.description:
Inside the Stunning Mansion in Ex Machina

There are many stunning, otherworldly sights in Ex Machina, the science-fiction film directed by Alex Garland that features a robot so lifelike she's played by actress Alicia Vikander. But the most breathtaking sight of all may be the 100 percent real, available-for-a-night's-stay location where the film is set: the Juvet Landscape Hotel in Norway.
